text: Lairembigee Eshei (Song of the Goddess) or Song of the Nymphs is a Meitei language play. It is written and directed by Ratan Thiyam. It is performed by the "Chorus Repertoire Theatre" of Imphal. It shows the seven nymphs seeing the changes in the human world. == References == Category:Meitei literature
title: Lairembigee Eshei
